title: Is We Dumb? | Ghost. Email. Playpen. Pinky Promise.
description:
Would you ever drive a stolen car to your court appearance... that's about a different car you stole? Someone actually did. Let's talk about that, a robber making you pinky promise to keep quiet, getting kicked off a plane for refusing to wear a mask, stripper mice, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?! 

 

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

 

Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/4Pdn1UIsJgw

 

Suggestions for segment content: dumb@iswedumb.com

Anything else: info@iswedumb.com

All Merch Inquiries: store@badmagicproductions.com
